item.title: Tax hikes on rich gather steam: Here's what to know
item.description: Tax hikes on the rich gathering steam in blue states. CNBC's Robert Frank joins 'Squawk Box' with the details.

item.title: LVMH beats earnings expectations as China recovery mounts
item.description: LVMH beat earnings expectations for a second straight quarter amid a China recovery that is starting to show up in luxury companies' balance sheets.
